'''Aria Torres''' is the half-sister of [[Callie Torres]].

==History==
===Early Life===
Aria may have grown up in Miami with her half-sister, Callie.

==Relationships==
===[[Callie Torres]]===
After her father returned from Seattle with the news that Callie now had a girlfriend; Aria, her mother, her aunt, her father, and more of their family started to ignore Callie and disowned her. ''(("[[No Good at Saying Sorry (One More Chance)]]")''

It is not known whether she eventually renewed her relationship with Callie or if she continues to ignore her.

==Notes and Trivia==
*Creator [[Shonda Rhimes]] stated on Twitter that Aria and Callie perhaps don't have the same father, as [[Carlos Torres]] mentioned Callie was his only little girl.
*In the episode [[White Wedding]], it is suggested that Callie's mother has never been divorced and would not have a baby out of wedlock. However, it is possible that Callie's mother was married to someone else before she met Carlos.
